Package com.pokerface.pokerapi.users

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    UserRepository
    This is the database repository of the User objects, each method written is a JPQL database wired up to MySQL.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    RegistrationFields
    RegistrationFields contains all the information that a client will use to create a new user account.
    User
    User is the database representation of the users permanent representation.
    UserConstants
    The constraints of the registration/user names.
    UserController
    UserController exists to map the communication from the Front End to the UserService where appropriate.
    UserInfoTransport
    UserInfoTransport is a user facing object that will deliver information that is ok for a standard user to view.
    UserService
    UserService operates with the UserController.
    UserTransport
    UserTransport is a user facing object that will deliver profile information to the owner of the profile.
    UserUpdateTransport
    UserUpdateTransport is an object conveying the new user information after registration is done but information changes
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    EmailAlreadyExistsException
    This exceptions handles when a user attempts to register with an existing email.
    UsernameAlreadyExistsException
    Checks to see if the username already exists, if it does, this exception is thrown.
